tables.mail_adapter:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_mail_adapter` (
  `id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `setting_form` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.mail_item:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_mail_item` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `is_sent` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `priority` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '100',
  `subject` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `body_text` text NOT NULL,
  `body_html` text NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.mail_template:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_mail_template` (
  `template_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `module_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
  `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `template_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `subject_default` varchar(100) DEFAULT '',
  `body_text_default` text,
  `body_html_default` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`template_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `mail_name` (`template_name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.mail_translate:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_mail_translate` (
  `template_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `language_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'en',
  `subject` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `body_text` text,
  `body_html` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`template_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.mail_transport:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_mail_transport` (
  `transport_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `transport_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'mail',
  `is_system` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `transport_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `params_text` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`transport_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
